branch_id.description: The specified branch of the resource. Defaults to main if not provided.

path.description: Path to a file or directory (e.g. 'dir/subdir/file.ts'). Pass in an empty string to represent the root directory.

content.description: File and val content. An empty string will create an empty file. When creating a directory, the content should be null or undefined.

anyOf.description: Path to the directory you'd like to move this file to (e.g. 'folder1/folder2')
